name: SenseCAP S2103
tagline: High-performance LoRaWAN® CO2 Sensor for Harsh Environments
description: SenseCAP S2103 is a robust CO2 sensor designed for outdoor and harsh environments. Compatible with worldwide LoRaWAN® networks, it offers an ultra-wide transmission range of up to 2 km in urban settings and 10 km in line-of-sight scenarios. Powered by a standard D-size SOCl2 battery (type: ER34615) with up to 10 years of battery life, it features an IP66-rated enclosure and an operating temperature range from -40℃ to +85℃. With simple no-code configuration via the SenseCAP Mate App and a series of rigorous reliability tests ensuring high performance under extreme conditions, the S2103 is engineered for demanding applications.

specifications.title: CO2
specifications.value: 400 to 10,000 ppm; ±(30 ppm + 3% of reading) (extended range ±10% of reading); 1 ppm resolution

specifications.title: LoRaWAN Support
specifications.value: LoRaWAN v1.0.3 Class A (supports 7 frequency plans)

specifications.title: Wireless Performance
specifications.value: Max transmitted power 19 dBm; Sensitivity -136 dBm @ SF12 BW=125KHz; Communication distance 2-10 km

specifications.title: Enclosure & Operating Conditions
specifications.value: IP66-rated; Effective CO2 measurement temperature 0 to +50 °C; Operating temperature for sensor module -40 to +85 °C; Operating humidity 0 to 90 %RH (non-condensing)

specifications.title: Battery
specifications.value: Up to 10 years; Standard D-size SOCl2 battery (19Ah, non-rechargeable)

features: Long battery life up to 10 years with easily replaceable battery
Designed for harsh environments: Operating temperature -40℃ to +85℃ and IP66-rated enclosure
Simple no-code configuration via SenseCAP Mate App
High-performance guarantee with extensive reliability testing
